The test expects output mz: [998, 999, 1000] (first three). So select_by_mz likely selects peaks with m/z <= 1000? Or selects the first half of the array? The function may have default behavior: keep peaks with m/z <= 1000 (maybe default max_mz=1000). Indeed the test expects to keep up to 1000 inclusive. So the function filters out peaks above 1000.

Thus the summary: The test verifies that `select_by_mz` filters a spectrum to keep only peaks with m/z <= 1000 when no parameters are provided. It checks that the resulting spectrum has 3 peaks and that the m/z and intensity arrays match the expected values.
